Elevator
Class ElevatorImpl

java.lang.Object
  Elevator.ElevatorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Elevator, java.lang.Runnable
public class ElevatorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Elevator

An elevator implementation that creates an elevator This class is the implementation of the Elevator interface. In here it takes requests at each destination involving the time to open and close the doors, letting people in and out, the amount of time the doors remain open and closing the doors. Also, if an elevator remains at one floor for a certain 'period' of time, it times out and returns to its default floor

Author:
Shabbir Vijapura/Harmeet Masuta

             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

e - - The elevator that will be assigned, based off number
floorNum - - The default floor number that the elevator will return to after a timeout.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Has the important loop of the elevator. It runs constantly because it needs to check for destinations that might have appeared in the queue. After a certain amount of time with no 'destinations', it will return to the default floor

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

goToNextFloor

private void goToNextFloor()
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
This moves the elevator to the next floor. The elevator sleeps based off the time it takes to simulate the time it takes to move. After arriving at the destination, it let's the people get off and on

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the sleeping threads are interrupted
See Also:
#arriveAtDestination()

reachedDestination

private void reachedDestination()
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Private method that deals with everything when an elevator arrives at its destination It removes the destination from the list, and opens/closes the door

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException
See Also:
toggleDoorOpen(boolean)

private void toggleDoorOpen(boolean open)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException

Parameters:
open - - Boolean check whether the door should be opened or closed
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - - If the thread is interrupted during sleep

checkForPeople

private void checkForPeople()
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
This private method checks for people and then waits for them to walk in, and then sets the direction/status

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - when the operation is interrupted

insertDestination

public void insertDestination(int f)
In here, this adds a destination to the elevators pending requests. If the elevator is on floor 8 and going up, it will only take requests above floor 8. If the elevator is on floor 8 and going down, it will only take requests that are below floor 8.

Specified by:
insertDestination in interface Elevator
Parameters:
f - - f is the floor that is being inserted into the destination

destinationsToString

Function that creates a string representation of the remaining destinations

destinations as a string

sortDestinations

private void sortDestinations()
Sorts the destinations ArrayList based on which direction the Elevator is moving towards Reverses the array if the elevator is moving down
